name: ApnaCircle
overview:
ApnaCircle is India’s first and leading Business and Career networking site. One of the pioneers in the Indian networking space, ApnaCircle connects professionals across India and gives them a platform to brand themselves, build the right contacts and find the right opportunities.

In the year 2009 ApnaCircle merged with Viadeo, the leading professional networking site of Europe and with Tianji, the leading professional networking site of China to form the leading global entity. With more than 45 million members worldwide and over 3 million in India, including CEOs, Senior Managers, Entrepreneurs, Consultants and professionals from various fields like Finance, Communications & Media, Production & Engineering, Marketing & Sales, ApnaCircle today is the world’s second largest and India’s largest local professional network on the Internet.

Headquartered at Paris, the group has its offices in New Delhi, Beijing, San Francisco, London, Spain, Italy, Germany, Mexico City, Morocco, Austria and more.
